claims.object: Mechanism where the relative motions of the rigid bodies are not confined to one plane.

surface_layer.definition: A mechanism that allows for motion in three dimensions.

deep_layer.mechanism: The rigid bodies move in three dimensions.
deep_layer.origin: Developed for applications requiring three-dimensional motion capabilities.

visual_features: Varies widely depending on the specific design and application
shape: Varies widely depending on the specific design and application
